column4: thomas@thomas-desktop:~$ ls ; Desktop  Examples  fdg  homework  MyMusic  The Chris McCarty Band; thomas@thomas-desktop:~$ sudo chown -hR thomas /fdg; chown: cannot access `/fdg': No such file or directory;                            what am I doing wrong
and you use chown to delete? that's done by rm
then sudo rm -rf fdg, while in your home directory
